import requests
import json

# Test the fixed agent
response = requests.post(
    'http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/agent/chat',
    json={'message': 'Which areas have the highest malaria risk?', 'timestamp': '2025-06-23T13:45:00'},
    timeout=60
)

print(f'Status: {response.status_code}')
if response.status_code == 200:
    result = response.json()
    print(f'Success: {result.get(\"success\")}')
    print(f'Message: {result.get(\"message\", \"No message\")[:200]}...')
    print(f'Approach: {result.get(\"approach_used\", \"Unknown\")}')
else:
    print(f'Error: {response.text[:200]}...')
")

import sys
sys.path.insert(0, '.')
from app import create_app
app = create_app()
print('CHECKING ROUTES:')
found_send_message = False
for rule in app.url_map.iter_rules():
    if 'send_message' in rule.rule:
        print(f'Found route: {rule.rule} -> {rule.endpoint}')
        found_send_message = True
if not found_send_message:
    print('ERROR: No send_message route found!')
print('APP CREATED SUCCESSFULLY')
")

Bash("/mnt/c/Users/bbofo/OneDrive/Desktop/chatmrpt_venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
import asyncio
import requests

async def test_viz():
    try:
        response = requests.post(''http://localhost:8000/api/v1/visualization/chat'',
                               json={''message'': ''Show me a test map'', ''session_id'': ''test''},
                               timeout=10)
        result = response.json()
        print(f''Status: {response.status_code}'')
        print(f''Success: {result.get(""success"")}'')
        if result.get(''success''):
            print(f''Title: {result.get(""title"")}'')
        else:
            print(f''Error: {result.get(""error_message"")}'')
    except Exception as e:
        print(f''Error: {e}'')

asyncio.run(test_viz())
")

import sys
sys.path.insert(0, '.')
try:
    from app.core.tool_registry import ToolRegistry
    print('ToolRegistry import successful')
    
    # Test basic tool discovery
    registry = ToolRegistry()
    tools_found = registry.discover_tools()
    print(f'Discovered {tools_found} tools')
    
    tool_names = registry.get_tool_names()
    print(f'Tool names: {tool_names[:5]}...')
    
    # Test getting schemas
    schemas = registry.get_tool_schemas()
    print(f'Generated {len(schemas)} tool schemas')
    
    print('SUCCESS: Pydantic tool integration working')
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f'Error: {e}')
    import traceback
    traceback.print_exc()
")
